title: Beautiful And Bright Townhouse
description: This Midtown Village/Washington Square West home is located on one of the most beautiful and historic streets in the city!  The property is located right in the heart of downtown Philadelphia with access to the best restaurants and bars in the city, the location could not be better! This home is also walking distance to hospitals like Penn and Jefferson, Center City shopping and all of the city's historical sites. As you step inside this historic Philadelphia home you’ll first see the large living area with a gas fireplace, great for the city’s snowy winters! The 1st floor features remarkable spacing for a living and dining area. The kitchen is perfectly suited for a chef with tons of counter space, storage, gas stove, and a door leading to your fantastic rear patio! Due to this being a CORNER property, you can easily take your trash to the street through your rear yard, no need to go back through your home! Up the stairs to the 2nd floor you’ll find your first bedroom with additional room for a desk and exercise equipment! Also on this floor is your very own spa-like bathroom with a double vanity, clothes washer and dryer, and tub/shower combo! Head up to the third floor to find your HUGE second bedroom. This could be converted into 2 bedrooms. It is so large! You’ll find tons of space for all sorts of layouts plus a walk-in closet! Last BUT not least is your unfinished basement. This space is perfect for all your storage needs. 300 South Fawn Street has everything you could want in a home in Philadelphia...outdoor space, central air, terrific kitchen, and large bedrooms! Welcome to 1042 S Cleveland St! This lovely townhouse has three stories and a finished basement. There are 3 spacious bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms. The contemporary open design features a floating staircase and high end finishes throughout. Located in the desirable Graduate Hospital area - conveniently located near everything the city has to offer: entertainment, shopping, dining, transportation, parks, the universities, and more! The spacious master suite is the entire third floor featuring a huge walk in closet. The kitchen has quartz countertops and Frigidaire Gallery Series Stainless Steel Appliances with gas cooking. The European bathroom also has beautiful cabinetry, tile and fixtures, dual shower heads, and frameless glass enclosures. 9-10 foot ceilings throughout and oversized 80 inch solid doors. Smart home technology: Lutron lighting control, climate control, ring camera/doorbell, and a Yale smart lock. Cable and internet wiring throughout. Solid 3/4 inch white oak floors throughout. Private large concrete patio in rear with cedar fence. Storage below the front exterior steps for trash cans and more. Energy efficient recessed LED lighting throughout. Oversized Anderson series 400 solid wood windows and sliding door with maintenance free aluminum clad exteriors. Sliding door allows an abundance of nature light. Convenient laundry closet on second floor. Sprinkler system. Upgraded insulation.

description:
NOTE: Feel free to contact me if this is not what you are looking for, I may have other properties to pass by you.
CONTACT NUMBER:  show contact info
2 BEDS
2.5 BATHS
1,054 SQUARE FEET
Inspired from the town of Tulum, Vesset Capital Partners brings you a tranquil and trendy renovation. Move right into this absolutely gorgeous, 2 bed, 2.5 bath newly renovated GRADUATE HOSPITAL townhome! This home is light-filled and contemporary with an eye-catching facade, custom wooden slat staircase, hardwood flooring, exposed brick accent walls, and a spacious back patio with in-ground garden beds. A bright open floor plan greets you as you enter the home, and the slatted wood staircase really defines the living room and gives a boho vibe. Heading past the living room you'll find a dining space, half bath with barn door and stylist wall paper and an eat-in kitchen. The kitchen features a breakfast bar, two toned flat panel cabinets, black cabinet pulls and faucet, quartz countertops, marble backsplash, and upgraded stainless steel appliances including a 6-range burner and a smart fridge. The dining room and kitchen feel fresh and airy with south-facing windows and access to the back patio with garden beds and modern privacy fencing. Head to the second floor for 2 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms. The two nicely sized bedrooms feature great closet space and natural and recessed lighting. The primary bedroom is complete with built-in storage next to the ensuite bath and a unique cutout by the window, perfect for plants. Both full bathrooms feature custom floor and shower tiling, a rain shower head in the primary bathroom, vanity storage, and a waterfall sink faucet. The second bedroom features exposed brick and ample windows. Need extra room? The fully finished basement is ideal for an additional living area, playroom, gym, or home office with storage along with a washer/dryer. This GRADUATE HOSPITAL location is amazing. You have groceries, fitness, parks, hot spot cafes, and restaurants all within walking distance. Sprouts Farmers Market, Dock Street Brewing, L’Anima BYO, Target, Marian Anderson Recreation Center, Schuylkill River Boardwalk, Fitzwater Street Philly Bagels, Founding Fathers Sports Bar & Grill, and more are within a mile of home. Plus, access to major highways, public transportation, and Center City is easy.
If you'd like to know more information about this property, please send me a message.
Listed Courtesy, Keller Williams Philly, Ryan Stawasz

title: Move right into this absolutely gorgeous, 2 bed, 2.5 bath newly renova
description:
Inspired from the town of Tulum, Vesset Capital Partners brings you a tranquil and trendy renovation. Move right into this absolutely gorgeous, 2 bed, 2.5 bath newly renovated GRADUATE HOSPITAL townhome! This home is light-filled and contemporary with an eye-catching facade, custom wooden slat staircase, hardwood flooring, exposed brick accent walls, and a spacious back patio with in-ground garden beds. A bright open floor plan greets you as you enter the home, and the slatted wood staircase really defines the living room and gives a boho vibe. Heading past the living room you'll find a dining space, half bath with barn door and stylist wall paper and an eat-in kitchen. The kitchen features a breakfast bar, two toned flat panel cabinets, black cabinet pulls and faucet, quartz countertops, marble backsplash, and upgraded stainless steel appliances including a 6-range burner and a smart fridge. The dining room and kitchen feel fresh and airy with south-facing windows and access to the back patio with garden beds and modern privacy fencing. Head to the second floor for 2 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms. The two nicely sized bedrooms feature great closet space and natural and recessed lighting. The primary bedroom is complete with built-in storage next to the ensuite bath and a unique cutout by the window, perfect for plants. Both full bathrooms feature custom floor and shower tiling, a rain shower head in the primary bathroom, vanity storage, and a waterfall sink faucet. The second bedroom features exposed brick and ample windows. Need extra room? The fully finished basement is ideal for an additional living area, playroom, gym, or home office with storage along with a washer/dryer. This GRADUATE HOSPITAL location is amazing. You have groceries, fitness, parks, hot spot cafes, and restaurants all within walking distance. Sprouts Farmers Market, Dock Street Brewing, L’Anima BYO, Target, Marian Anderson Recreation Center, Schuylkill River Boardwalk, Fitzwater Street Philly Bagels, Founding Fathers Sports Bar & Grill, and more are within a mile of home. Plus, access to major highways, public transportation, and Center City is easy. Want to see this in person? Schedule your showing today!

title: Spacious and One of the Best Apartment Buildings in Philadelphia!!
description:
The Metropolitan apartments in Center City, Philadelphia stand tall in the center of Philadelphia's historic skyline. Designed by French architect Louis Jallade in the 1920s, this twin-tower apartment building showcases 26 stories of Art Deco elegance and has a prominent history as the former Philadelphia YMCA Armed Forces Building. Before being transformed into the Center City apartment building it is today, The Metropolitan was home to United States servicemen during World War II. Today, The Metropolitan is recognized as one of the best apartment buildings in Philadelphia. You will find a spacious studio, 1-, 2-and 3-bedroom apartment rentals. As well as amenities that include a lounge, gym, basketball court and a rooftop with a gorgeous view of the City Hall and Love Park. The Metropolitan apartments feature original limestone details, terra-cotta tiles, and hand-carved cornices. Fall in love with restored architectural details and contemporary amenities, including renovated kitchens with luxurious personal touches.
117 N 15th #1905
